  • utils.generate_pdf

Source code for utils.generate_pdf

import os
import glob
from fpdf import FPDF
from loguru import logger


[docs]def generate_pdf(mjc_vlt1_path, mjc_vlt2_path, mjc_vlt3_path):
    """
    Generate pdf report with all the validation plots
    """

    # if generate pdf report, then initilize the pdf file
    pdf = FPDF('L', 'mm', 'A4') # Landscape A4 (210 by 297 mm)
    states = ['Massachusetts', 'New Hampshire']
       
    # Landscape A4 (297 by 210 mm)
    # general settings
    x_ind0 = 0
    x_ind1 = 20
    x_ind2 = 40
    x_ind3 = 60

    ''' First Page '''
    pdf.add_page()
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'B', 36)
    pdf.cell(100, 20, 'MuJoCo Model Convertion Validation', 0, 2, 'L')

    pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
    y_cell1 = 60
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 1: Forward Kinematic Validation', 0, 2, 'L')

    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind2, y_cell1+15)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Check correctness of bone meshes and joint definitions', 0, 2, 'L')
    
    pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
    y_cell2 = 100
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell2)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 2: Muscle Moment Arm Validation', 0, 2, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind2, y_cell2+15)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Check how muscle wrapping over the joints', 0, 2, 'L')
    
    pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
    y_cell3 = 140
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell3)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 3: Muscle Force Validation', 0, 2, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind2, y_cell3 + 15)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Check the muscle force-length relationship', 0, 2, 'L')

    # run through the step 1 folder and add all the plots
    pdf.add_page()
    pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+10, 20)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 1: Forward Kinematic Validation', 0, 1, 'L')

    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    y_cell1 = 40
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Randomly pose the model with 10 confgurations within the joint limits.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+15)
    pdf.cell(180, 0, "In each pose, the endpoints(markers) global locations of Osim and Mjc models ", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+25)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "are extracted and compared.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+40)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Box plot of their mean-std errros are plotted together.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+55)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Individual endpoint differences of these 10 postures are also ploted in the VLT folder,", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+70)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "but not included inside this report", 0, 1, 'L')
    
    logger.info("   Adding vlt1 results.")

    # Scan the end_points folder to find all .svg files and add the overall comparison to the pdf report
    vlt1_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt1_path + "/end_points/*.svg")]

    if len(vlt1_plot_list) == 1:  # only empty overall_comp plot generated, no end point plots
        pdf.add_page()
        pdf.cell(0, 0, "NO end point found in the model.", 0, 1, 'L')

    else:

        # first add the overall comparsion plots
        for vlt1_name in vlt1_plot_list:
            if "overall_comp" in vlt1_name:
                # pdf.add_page()
                pdf.image(mjc_vlt1_path + '/end_points/' + vlt1_name + '.svg', w = 280, h = 200)

    # Scan the coordinate_coupler_constraints folder to find all .svg files and add the overall comparison to the pdf report
    if os.path.isdir(mjc_vlt1_path + "/coordinate_coupler_constraints"):

        # title page of the custom joints
        pdf.add_page()
        pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
        pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+20, 20)
        pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Approximation of custom joints', 0, 1, 'L')

        vlt1_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt1_path + "/coordinate_coupler_constraints/*.svg")]

        # add all plots
        for vlt1_name in vlt1_plot_list:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt1_path + '/coordinate_coupler_constraints/' + vlt1_name + '.svg', w = 240)
    
    # Scan the custom joints folder to find all .svg files and add the overall comparison to the pdf report
    if os.path.isdir(mjc_vlt1_path + "/custom_joints"):

        # title page of the custom joints
        pdf.add_page()
        pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
        pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+20, 20)
        pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Approximation of custom joints', 0, 1, 'L')

        vlt1_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt1_path + "/custom_joints/*.svg")]

        # add all plots
        for vlt1_name in vlt1_plot_list:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt1_path + '/custom_joints/' + vlt1_name + '.svg', w = 240)

    
    # Scan the moving path folder to find all .svg files and add the overall comparison to the pdf report
    if os.path.isdir(mjc_vlt1_path + "/moving_path_points"):

        # title page of the moving path points
        pdf.add_page()
        pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
        pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+20, 20)
        pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Approximation of moving path points', 0, 1, 'L')

        vlt1_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt1_path + "/moving_path_points/*.svg")]

        # add all plots
        for vlt1_name in vlt1_plot_list:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt1_path + '/moving_path_points/' + vlt1_name + '.svg', w = 240)

    # Scan the moving path folder to find all .svg files and add the overall comparison to the pdf report
    if os.path.isdir(mjc_vlt1_path + "/conditional_path_points"):

            # title page of the moving path points
        pdf.add_page()
        pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
        pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+20, 20)
        pdf.cell(0, 0, 'Approximation of conditional path points', 0, 1, 'L')

        vlt1_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt1_path + "/conditional_path_points/*.svg")]

        # add all plots
        for vlt1_name in vlt1_plot_list:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt1_path + '/conditional_path_points/' + vlt1_name + '.svg', w = 240)

            
    # run through the step 2 folder and add all the plots
    pdf.add_page()
    pdf.set_font('Arial', '', 24)
    
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+10, 20)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 2: Muscle Moment Arm Validation', 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    y_cell1 = 40
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Moment arm of each muscle at each joint are compared between Osim and converted MJC model.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+15)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "A overall heatmap is included to indicate the overall moment arm errors before and after optimization.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+30)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Then detail moment arm curves are plotted for comparison.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+45)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "For the muscles that wrap over muitiple joints, moment arms with respect to one joint maybe affected by several other joints", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+60)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "In this case, several mesh points were check of these affecting joints, when plotting moment arms at one joint", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+75)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "This is why there are multiple lines (with different grey levels) plotted for one muscle on one joint", 0, 1, 'L')
    
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'B', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+100)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "How to inteprate the plot", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+115)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Global title indicate the muscle and joints that affecting the moment arms in the plots", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+130)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "X axis indicate the joint that moment arms were extracted", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+145)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Grey level of the lines indicate the mesh postures of other relvant joints (in the global tile, but not the x axis)", 0, 1, 'L')

    logger.info("   Adding vlt2 results.")
    # Scan the result folder to find all the <muscle_name>.png files and add all of them to the pdf report
    vlt2_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt2_path + "/moment_arms/*.svg")]

    # first add the overall comparsion plots
    for vlt2_name in vlt2_plot_list:
        if "overall_comp" in vlt2_name:
            # pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt2_path + '/moment_arms/' + vlt2_name + '.svg', w = 280, h = 180)

    for vlt2_name in vlt2_plot_list:
        if not "overall_comp" in vlt2_name:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt2_path + '/moment_arms/' + vlt2_name + '.svg', w = 280, h = 140)

    # run through the step 3 folder and add all the plots
    pdf.add_page()
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'B', 24)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind0+10, 20)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, '* Step 3: Muscle Force Validation', 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    y_cell1 = 40
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Muscle force-length property are validated between Osim and Mjc models", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+15)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "This force-length property only depends on muscle-fiber-tendon unit lengths.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+30)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "We made it isolated with the moment arm, so that the change in moment arms will not affect the muscle force properties", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+45)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "The muscle-fiber-tendon unit lengths were roughly even extracted (from shorest to longest) with all possible body postures.", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+60)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "A bar plot of the froce errors of all muscle before and after optimization is included", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+75)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Then the detail force-length curve comparsion plot of each muscle is included", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.ln()
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'B', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+100)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "How to inteprate the plot", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_font('Arial', 'I', 16)
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+115)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "Global title indicate the muscle name", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+130)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "X axis indicate the muscle-fiber-tendon unit length", 0, 1, 'L')
    pdf.set_xy(x_ind1, y_cell1+145)
    pdf.cell(0, 0, "y axis is the muscle force (unnormalized)", 0, 1, 'L')

    logger.info("   Adding vlt3 results.")
    # Scan the result folder to find all the <muscle_name>.png files and add all of them to the pdf report
    vlt3_plot_list = [os.path.split(f)[1][0:-4] for f in glob.glob(mjc_vlt3_path + "/muscle_forces/*.svg")]

    # first add the overall comparsion plots
    for vlt3_name in vlt3_plot_list:
        if "overall_comp" in vlt3_name:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt3_path + '/muscle_forces/' + vlt3_name + '.svg', w = 280, h = 140)

    for vlt3_name in vlt3_plot_list:
        if not "overall_comp" in vlt3_name:
            pdf.add_page()
            pdf.image(mjc_vlt3_path + '/muscle_forces/' + vlt3_name + '.svg', w = 280, h = 140)


    return pdf
